Construct an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying data-members as follows:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c/core|nullptr}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;()}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|next_}} with {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;()}}.

@2@ A private constructor which is used by {{tt|chunk_by_view::begin}} and {{tt|chunk_by_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users. Initializes:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c|std::addressof(parent)}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|current}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|next_}} with {{c|next}}.

{{par|parent|a parent object}}

{{par end}}
